page.title: 02LOCAL NEWS
page.content: We interviewed Mr.M.Cooper,a member of the community magazine{"Comment". "Comment" relies on contributions locally and the views on matters from previous issues.Its purpose is to provide a platform for anyone to give their opinion. It is printed locally by A.Doggart every two months. Since it began in 1980 there have been some 30 issues. On average the magazine is read by two people per issue.1000 to 1200 copies are sold in the newsagents. "Comments" main distribution points are{Aberfeldy,Pitlochry}and{Dunkeld. In the summer, they are also sold at caravan sites in the area.
